title: Embroidery: Crewel Wool, 17th - 18th century
medium:
Medium: wool on cotton
Technique: embroidered on twill weave
description: Twill weave cotton embroidered in dark blue crewel. Stylized floral forms and leaves. Left edge shows green wool braid.
